TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. The words are in Elvish, so you have no clue what they mean.

I wish for Phil Colander.

Granted. You get a guy named Phil Colander.

I wish for a lava lamp.

Granted. It's made of real lava and burns your house down. It's also shaped like a lemon.

I wish for combustible lemons.

Granted they combust you.

I wish for my KSP to load quicker.

Granted it takes 999999999999999999999 years to Load.

I wish for 10 dollars.

Granted, but they're Zimbabwean dollars.

I wish for a new alarm clock.

Granted, it shakes the planet to pieces.

I wish for a chocolate bar right now...

Granted, but you don't get it right here.

I wish for a spoon.

Granted, its in your eyeball.

I wish the chocolate bar was next to me

Fine, but not now.

I wish for our robot camera thingy to start working.

Granted, you have to kill the closest person to you no matter what now.

I wish for a better KSP demo. And more vanilla planets.

Granted. No one buys the game now, and development halts due to lack of funds.

I wish for a despotic monarchy.

Granted, the first one to be executed is you.

I wish an anonymous person donated $250 billion to NASA.

Granted, but they spend it all on snacks.

I wish that I could possess objects and influence their movement.

Granted, you send one into your eye by mistake

I wish I was a jedi

Granted, You accidentally cut your head off while playing with the lightsaber.

I wish to make Guyana can into space.

Granted, you get killed on the first launch

I wish for world peace.

Edited February 11, 2014 by Pockrtplanesairways
wrong thing

Granted, the world splits into pieces.

I wish that the south of England is no longer flooded, and instead the water is stored as ice at the poles.

Granted. The ice melts again.

I wish Poland can into space.

Granted. This space happens to be a few meters away from the event horizon of a black hole.

I wish for more free time.

Granted, you receive an additional femtosecond of freetime

I wish for a better keyboard

Granted, it doesn't work though.

I wish for a bacon flavored lays chips in a full bag.

Granted but YOU are the chips.

I wish for people to understand me.

Granted, but they don't care.

I wish for love.

Granted, you are loved by a deadly razor bladed Scyther.

I wish for a pointless button.
